attributes.action: Stop plans for congestion charging for motorcyclists £5.00
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government now plan to introduce a congestion charge for bikes... this is ridculous as the whole point in congestion charge is to reduce traffic and carbon emmisions. So why is the government going to charge us bikers!!!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop plans for congestion charging for motorcyclists £5.00."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14286.asp

Prime Minister's Office
